newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to watch.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to watch.

text.p: * Clarify Inc fell in after-hours trading Tuesday to 7-1/8 from a close of 16-3/4 after reporting higher first quarter earnings but forecasting little revenue growth in the seond quarter. The stock fell 2-5/8 during regular trading hours.
* Compaq Computer Corp reported first quarter earnings per share of $1.36, up from $0.85 a year ago and the First Call consensus forecast of $1.31. The stock closed at 74-3/4.
* Apple Computer Inc is expected to report a second quarter loss per share of $1.22, compared to a loss of $1.78 in the year-ago period, according to First Call. The stock closed at 18-7/16.
* Merck & Co reported first quarter earnings per share of $0.84, up from $0.70 a year ago and a First Call estimate of $0.83. The stock closed at 84-1/2.
* Shares of Philip Morris Cos Inc traded at 40-1/2 in London, up from their New York close at 38-7/8.
RJR Nabisco Holdings Corp was up 3/4 at 31.

The Wall Street Journal said Philip Morris and RJR were in talks that could lead to the elimination of nearly all of the tobacco industry's liability in return for strict advertising curbs and a payment of up to $300 billion over the next 25 years.
* International Business Machines Corp was up 1/2 at 138-3/8 in London. Texas Instruments Inc was 1/4 better at 84-3/4.
* Boeing Co was off 3/8 at 100-1/2 in London.
